sentence.Network_en: National isolation can only cause economic and cultural impoverish-ment.
sentence.Network_cn: 锁国只会导致经济和文化上的困厄。

sentence.Network_en: These changes are likely to impoverish single-parent families even further.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些变革很可能使单亲家庭更加贫困。

sentence.Network_en: Reducing the income will further impoverish these families and could tempt an offender into further crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 降低收入只会使这些家庭更加贫穷，而且可能诱使不法分子进一步犯罪。

since beginning the work that help deficient up , we use what the country dials to support deficient fund , aid to masses development grows project , impoverished population year after year drops .开展扶贫工作以来，我们利用国家拨给的扶贫资金，扶持群众发展种养项目，贫困人口逐年下降。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (formerly also as empoverish): from Old French empoveriss-, lengthened stem of empoverir, based on povre 'poor'

entry.def: Something that impoverishes a person or a country makes them poor.

example.ex: We need to reduce the burden of taxes that impoverish the economy.
example.tran: 我们需要减轻导致经济困顿的税收负荷。
因战时通货膨胀导致贫困的社会

entry.def: A person or thing that impoverishes something makes it worse in quality.

example.tran: 使土壤迅速贫瘠的植物

auth_sentence.content: Self-sufficiency will destroy those markets and further impoverish those countries.
auth_sentence.res_content: Self-sufficiency will destroy those markets and further impoverish those countries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Self-sufficiency will destroy those markets and further impoverish those countries.

auth_sentence.content: They do however increase purchase of agro-chemi-TOXINS and impoverish farmers.
auth_sentence.res_content: They do however increase purchase of agro-chemi-TOXINS and impoverish farmers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They do however increase purchase of agro-chemi-TOXINS and impoverish farmers.

auth_sentence.content: But if you harvest wood continuously, you impoverish the soil.
auth_sentence.res_content: But if you harvest wood continuously, you impoverish the soil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But if you harvest wood continuously, you impoverish the soil.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"像……一样,有……的",通常放在具体的名词后; 2. 表动词,"造成……,成……"

stems_affixes.word_buile: slug懒汉+ish像……一样,有……的→sluggish→行动迟钝的,缓慢的
book书+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.书呆子的
boor粗野的人,不懂礼貌的人+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.粗野的
child孩子+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.孩子的;幼稚的
churl粗野的人,吝啬鬼+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.脾气暴躁的
cold冷+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.微冷的
colt小马,无经验的年轻人+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.放浪不拘的,似小马的
fadd时尚+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.流行一时的,时尚的
fat非,胖+ish像……一样,有……的→fattish略胖的
fiend魔鬼+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.极凶恶的
fool愚人,白痴+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.愚笨的,愚蠢的
mode时尚+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.时髦的
self自己+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.自私的
snob势利的人,假内行+ish像……一样,有……的→snobbish势利的,谄上欺下的
wag摇摆,小丑+ish像……一样,有……的→waggish→诙谐的,滑稽的
yellow黄+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.微黄色的
pol擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,擦亮;使优美,润饰 n.擦光剂,上光蜡
di分开+mini小+ish造成……,成……→变小,减少
em进入+bell美好+ish造成……,成……→进入美好→装饰
fam饿+ish造成……,成……→v.使饥饿
flour花+ish造成……,成……→v.繁荣,茂盛;挥舞
furb擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,刷新
im进入+pover贫困+ish造成……,成……→v.使成赤贫
pol擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,擦亮;使优美,润饰 n.擦光剂,上光蜡
vanqu克服+ish造成……,成……→v.征服,击溃

Sentence.sentence: But we would be equally impoverished (贫困的) without humanistic knowledge as well.

sentences.en: They were impoverished by a prolonged spell of unemployment.
sentences.cn: 他们因长期失业而一贫如洗。

sentences.en: Its use spreads disease and impoverishes the land.
sentences.cn: 用了它之后, 病害蔓延, 土地贫瘠。
